project.name: Extensions
project.description: This is the parent project for all Codeprimate Extensions, which provides extensions to and integrations with 3rd-party Java libraries and frameworks commonly used to build applications in Java. Additionally, Extensions provides integrations between Codeprimate software, such as Elements, and 3rd-party Java libraries. These integrations will likely be implemented as Adapters to the underlying Java library or framework in order to conform to Elements' abstractions and interfaces where applicable.
